title: How to Prepare Nasi Lemak

steps.headline: Add all the ingredients for cooking the coconut rice into the rice cooker.
Switch the rice cooker on and cook the rice for about 40 minutes.
Blend chilli, shallots, belacan and garlic into a paste.
Heat up the cooking oil in a saucepan.
Fry the sliced onions until golden, and don't forget to add a little water in it.
Add in the blended paste and stir fry it for about 2 minutes.
Add in the tamarind paste and prawns.
After about 1 minute, add sugar, salt and a little pepper to taste.
If the gravy is too dry, add some water.
Serve the hot cooked coconut rice with the Sambal Chilli.
Garnish the dish with eggs, anchovies, peanuts and cucumber.

text: Prepare the Coconut Rice Add all the ingredients for cooking the coconut rice into the rice cooker.  Mix the ingredients well.  Switch the rice cooker on and cook the rice for about 40 minutes.  Prepare the Sambal Chilli Blend chilli, shallots, belacan and garlic into a paste.  Heat up the cooking oil in a saucepan.  Fry the sliced onions until golden, and don't forget to add a little water in it.  Add in the blended paste and stir fry it for about 2 minutes.  Add in the tamarind paste and prawns.  After about 1 minute, add sugar, salt and a little pepper to taste.  Cook until the gravy thickens.  If the gravy is too dry, add some water.  Turn off the heat.  Serving the Dish Serve the hot cooked coconut rice with the Sambal Chilli.  Garnish the dish with eggs, anchovies, peanuts and cucumber.
